title: The effects of Sr-substitution in Ba2SmTi2Nb3O15 ceramics: structural study, optical properties, and complex impedance spectroscopy
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,8567-8577
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00068D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Karim. Chourti, Ilyas. Jalafi, Amine. Bendahhou, Soufian El Barkany, Mohamed. Abou-Salama
Ceramics of (Ba1−xSrx)2SmTi2Nb3O15, denoted as BSxSTN (x = 0, 0.25 and 0.5), were synthesized by the conventional solid-state reactions route.
